revised_title: The Influence of External Medium on Muscle Internal pH
tldr: The author investigates the effect of external medium on the internal pH of muscle and concludes that muscles maintain their internal pH by active metabolic effort. The Donnan equilibrium does not control the distribution of hydrogen ions across the muscle fiber membrane. The study shows that when the controlling mechanism fails, the contractile function of the muscle deteriorates.
